title: Just Do It - Ultimate collection of hentai sex scenes only
description:
A big collection of only sex scenes from numerous hentai videos. There are a total of 318 clips spanning nearly 15 hours.

Content Selection: I went through a large number of scenes, and many did not make the cut. I only kept scenes that were of decent quality, and were relatively "tame" in comparison of what you may see in hentai. The rule of thumb is "nothing you wouldn't see in mainstream porn." A few more hardcore scenes were thrown in to add variety, but I did not include the following:

    Blood (including "cherry popping" blood) / violence / torture
    Tentacles / monsters
    Aggressive rape / humiliation
    Piss / scat
    Lots of internal/xray shots
    Fluid injection / syringes / whatever they're doing
    Shemale
    3D (most scenes I found were repetitive or lame)


It didn't take me long to get bored of scenes of 1-on-1 vaginal sex, so I started to skip a lot of those and prioritize anal, threesome/group sex, and other fun stuff. Otherwise, everything just started to blur together.

Audio / Subtitles: Most everything (if not everything) is un-dubbed. Subtitles are included in majority of the scenes where they were available, but I explicitly removed subtitles that either 1) made the scene "darker" (e.g. mention of aggressive rape), or 2) were just a turn-off or weird (e.g. "no, not in my poop-hole! I poop from there!").

Censoring: There are both censored and uncensored scenes, and more censored than not. Just the way hentai comes. However, most of the included scenes that are censored should be lighter on the censoring (can still make out the shapes despite the pixelation).
